about_the_game:
「Bargaining」as the core, with the cyberpunk style of art performance, 《lower? higher!》 wants to provide you with a different experience of pawnshop operation.
You will trade with customers with different needs, and in the process, you can speculate on the psychology of the customer, change the properties of the product, or directly pray to the dice god -- these various business methods can help you achieve the maximum profit of the pawnshop.




All kinds of guests have different personalities and preferences, and it is not easy to entertain them. It is possible to achieve the purpose of trade by mobilizing different bargaining strategies.
The same product in different customers also have different valuation, as soon as possible to sell or wait for a predestined person? It's up to you.



Instead of wasting the money you've already paid, use the special skills of a shop assistant. What if there's a surprise?



As a pawnshop owner, you also have to deal with tax collector, missionary priests, suspicious people looking flustered, etc...Note that some customers will also come with something in mind, and the price level will quietly fan the butterfly effect on them.
Buy and sell in the cyber world, there is unexpected humor and fun, one click to join the wish list, to make it the greatest pawnshop in White Star!
detailed_description:
「Bargaining」as the core, with the cyberpunk style of art performance, 《lower? higher!》 wants to provide you with a different experience of pawnshop operation.
You will trade with customers with different needs, and in the process, you can speculate on the psychology of the customer, change the properties of the product, or directly pray to the dice god -- these various business methods can help you achieve the maximum profit of the pawnshop.




All kinds of guests have different personalities and preferences, and it is not easy to entertain them. It is possible to achieve the purpose of trade by mobilizing different bargaining strategies.
The same product in different customers also have different valuation, as soon as possible to sell or wait for a predestined person? It's up to you.



Instead of wasting the money you've already paid, use the special skills of a shop assistant. What if there's a surprise?



As a pawnshop owner, you also have to deal with tax collector, missionary priests, suspicious people looking flustered, etc...Note that some customers will also come with something in mind, and the price level will quietly fan the butterfly effect on them.
Buy and sell in the cyber world, there is unexpected humor and fun, one click to join the wish list, to make it the greatest pawnshop in White Star!
name: Lower? higher!: buy or bye

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10(64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz(64bit)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600(AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10(64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz(64bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970(Dedicated 4GB AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: your pawnshop will usher in guests with different needs every day, bargain with them, let the income soar! With the expansion of pawnshops, activities such as sending shop assistants and responding to emergencies are also essential. you seem ordinary transaction may cause the butterfly effect.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
